title: Runway Collections Inspired By Vibes From '60s And '70s
teaser: Renee Montagne looks back at the best of New York Fashion Week with Deborah Needleman, editor-in-chief of T: The New York Times Style Magazine, and looks forward to what will hit the European runways.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
